channel.title: Shop Rights [317]
channel.description:
can anyone tell me how to change shp rights, its been a while sense i edited shop rigths so if you know can you help me pleas?
thanks :)

item.title: Shop Rights [317]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“BubbleScape x, post:5, topic:349073”][quote author=pkpoison link=topic=445447.msg3270252#msg3270252 date=1279147263]

What do you mean by shop rights? if you mean only staff can enter it, i dont think thats possible…

Shutup.

Try like & PlayerRights = 3
[/quote]Fuck you shitstick.[/quote]
Nah, you deserve it. If you think it isnt possible, why dont you try his idea? shitstick…

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Rights [317]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

First, get a spell checker.

Second, this is a simple task as all you need to know is how an if statement is constructed.

if(expr) {
    statements
}

Just use this simple if statement with conditional operators (&& , ||) etc. I think an example is in order.

if(playerRights > 2) { // 3+
    openShop(53);
} else {
    sendMessage("You're not the owner.");
}

NOTE: Do not copy and paste that code as the chances are it will NOT work.

Read full topic
